title: Love in the Palm
overview: After hearing the news of the death of the warlord's father, Marshal Xue Dongfeng returned from the front line to attend the funeral and succeeded him as warlord, only to find that his fianc√©e Ji Lianyun had married his father as his concubine five days ago! Xue Dongfeng thought that Ji Lianyun had betrayed him and was extremely mean and humiliating to him, but he always came to rescue Ji Lianyun when he was in deep crisis. Seeing Ji Lianyun and his adopted brother Xue Zhihai getting closer and closer, he finally He discovered that he had never forgotten that innocent first love...
